mapper.select: select m_number from movie where m_name = #{m_name}
select m_number, m_name, m_opening, m_reopening, m_runtime, m_grade, m_director, m_actor, m_attendance, m_awards from movie where m_number = #{m_number}

select m_number from movie where m_name like concat('%',#{m_name},'%') and m_opening > #{m_opening} and m_reopening > #{m_reopening} and m_runtime > #{m_runtime} and m_grade > #{m_grade} and m_director like concat('%',#{m_director},'%') and m_actor like concat('%',#{m_actor},'%') and m_attendance > #{m_attendance} and m_awards like concat('%',#{m_awards},'%')
